name: ELEKS
body:
### Welcome to ELEKS open-source projects directory.
Even though we mainly develop proprietary software for our customer, we have our own open-source projects and contribute to project maintained by other people and organizations. Here you can find a list of open-source projects we maintain or contribute to:

[Event Store](http://geteventstore.com) - an awesome, rock-solid, super-fast persistence engine for event-sourced applications. ELEKS employees @anakryiko, @ysw, @kpyatkivskyy, @MarkiyanMatsekh and @TarasRoshko are the most active contributors to this project. 

[ADEL](http://eleks.github.io/ADEL/) - template-based automatic differentiation library for C++/CUDA.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
